Text:
My virtual hat is off to DMT et cetera, but... I've been thinking about this: If EngSubs were also included.. (as the space taken is insignificant) ..wouldn't that increase the both seeders and leechers?
Maybe they already thought it out and have a good reason of otherwise quality stuff but "hey let's screw all the non-Duchers so they gotta get their own subs yeah!" :P
